markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">
[Stormwind Flight](/Spells.aspx?ID=1859)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 382 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Powerful winds carry you through the air, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as [_gentle landing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1542).

---
**Heightened (6th)** When you fly using _stormwind flight_, you ignore difficult terrain from wind.
name: Stormwind Flight

summary_markdown: Powerful winds carry you through the air, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed.
text: Stormwind Flight Two Actions Source Player Core pg. 382 2.0 Duration 1 minute --- Powerful winds carry you through the air, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as gentle landing . --- Heightened (6th) When you fly using stormwind flight , you ignore difficult terrain from wind.
